metadata.title: CVE-2024-0125 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in thenvdisam command line tool, where a user can cause a NULL pointerdereference by running nvdisasm on a malformed ELF file. A successfulexploit of this vulnerability might lead to a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
